data.title: Perfect Family Fun!!!!!
data.text: We had a Fantastic time with our 3 Grandsons bowling, arcade and great food.  There were bumpers for our two little fellas and the would lift for the rest of us which made for a real fun afternoon.  After bowling and eats it was time for the Arcades, there were games for all ages.  It was a PERFECT family outing!!!!

data.title: Good place for for fun!
data.text: Great place for family fun or a night out with friends.  We like to go bowling here with our kids on Sunday Mornings and any time we can.  The place is clean, they have an arcade and games to earn tickets to redeem for prizes, they offer cosmic bowling on weekends, leagues,  and they have a great menu.  The food is fresh made.  The pizza is amazing!!!  They also have a lounge with karaoke!  You won't be bored here, something for everyone.

data.title: Arcade and bowling
data.text:
Great place to spend some fun and entertaining time with family or friends. They have 44 lanes but you might encounter a wait. No worries they give you a pager and you can go spend a little time in the arcade.

We went on Saturday night and it was cosmic bowling under the backlights. Just adds a little more to the fun night. The snack bar is reasonably priced, but can take awhile so order early.

data.title: Great place to be with friends, family and bar connected
data.text: Had a great time and no issues that I think of with games, well one hickup that reset somehow in middle of open lane, but we did not bother telling them as had to leave.  I am sure they would have corrected it, had it been critical game of play

data.title: lots of lanes.
data.text: Great place to bowl. Clean, friendly staff, good food. Since I am a man of few words I can only add that I love bowling there.

data.title: Not bad for this area.
data.text: Small and aged but it's the only place to go if you want to go bowling in this area. Most everyone knows everyone else and it's not bad for what it is. Comfortable.
